reviewText:
I don't see the point.

The developer (who i assume is just one person, it certainly seems that way) greenlit and is now selling a fps multiplayer shooter in 2016 with nothing that wasn't being done in 2005. You get two identical maps, which are very generic, and one brown map that is supposed to resemble a Roman fighting arena with teleport pods because...?  Total of 3 maps, and they all are crap.

Multiplayer will be dead soon, if it isn't already. At this point, it'll be just another amateur hour dead MP only game on the steam store. Of hundreds already.

All the weapons here are in every other game, only they control and behave worse than usual. The grenades are hilariously awful.

The sniper rifle is a one shot, one kill so that's basically the only weapon worth using. When enemies die, their rag doll has a massive fit 50 percent of the time, where it twitches or flies all over the place for a few seconds. Weird, nonsense physics. Players can abuse the jump to make themselves harder to hit, but it really isn't that effective. But you can expect to see a lot of people just jumping around with rocket launchers, if you do encounter a match. People aren't matched based on their location, its a free for all with whatever lobby you wish to join.

This is generic as generic first person multiplayer shooters go.

When asked why the game has no volume options, sliders, or mute for certain types, the developer responded with this.
I didn't add one
date: you can open mixer volume from a windows tray icon (lower right of your desktop) while you have the game opened (minimized)
recommended:
and there lower the sound for masked shooters 2"

Lazy.

Thanks greenlight. This developer is already trying to get more lazy half arsed crap greenlit and probably will because the same people who greenlit this and ultimately forgot all about it
hoursPlayed: will do the same thing. They never actually buy these games.\n\nDon't get me started on why this is an apparent sequel to a game nobody heard of
voteText: or cares about. Its not like you can play the first one
helpfulPercent: anyway. It was probably an itch.io failed project."

reviewText:
I got the game yesterday and played it with a friend for 2hours to get all the achievements.
These are my opinions about it:

Pro:
-Very fast gameplay just like a quake like
-Very optimized, i have played it with a solid 60fps all along
-You can do epic stunts by walking on the corps of those you killed !
-I did a trip to the top of the world by jumping on the corps of someone
-9 guns !!!
-You can crouch !!!
-No Nikudan

Cons:
-Not enough map (people online always use the same map)
-I got this camera glitch which make it always looking up :(
-When you are killed sometime the camera goes WTF
-When you play online you often spawn at the same time and in the same place as enemies

I got more fun than playing CS or any other fps. Seriously great game. Don't by Overwatch or any other crap, buy this game. Also who care about graphics when you get so much fun ?

In conclusion:
5/7 game, pay respect to the developer(s)

reviewText:
:: Recommended only if obtained free ::

Pros:

- Runs on any potato. Even a mashed one;

reviewText:
This game is alright but not really something that I can really get into.
There are a lot of issues with this game and barely anyone plays...
Hit boxes are somewhat on point but even when you jump or are falling off a building (which does not damage you), you can still shoot someone with 100% accuracy.
Spawning can sometimes be a pain when there is no spawn protection and automatically get killed when joining a game or reviving back to life.
The graphics are actually alright for this game.
It's not a bad game, just not a good one either...

5/10

reviewText:
Product received for free

This game has a lot of potential. It is a little glitchy, but that can be easily fixed. The game was honestly Pretty bad, but hilarious. i enjoyed it a lot for some weird reason. I hope to see this game get farther in the future. One huge con i had during the game is how the hitboxes seemed to be. I could shoot like 6 feet in front of a moving target and it would hit him. So i will give it 7/10 for now, and hope to see it grow.

Pros
+Runs on almost any computers or potatos.
+Really amusing for some odd reason
+Did not crash in the time i played it

Cons
-Weird Hitboxes
-Pretty bad graphics
-Some lag for other players (Others seem to jump around a lot, even bots)
- 3$ price tag

If you happen to obtain it for free like i did, give it a try.

reviewText:
The basic information about this game:Name: Masked Shooters 2
Published and released by: FreezeNova
Date of release: 15 January 2016
Note: This game is also available in the Google Play Store.

Gameplay:There is such no class like recon or assault, YOU are EVERY class, that means that if you play this game you have 9 weapons, from a knife to a RPG! This was the first time that I saw a game where you have every weapon. For my opinion this isn‚Äôt a problem and makes the game looks cooler, but I‚Äôm sure that there are guys that don‚Äôt like that, this is in every game the same. I enjoyed the game very very much, I called it a long time my FAVORITE GAME! But when you play this a long time without stopping it‚Äôs getting bored, the servers are now alive, but I‚Äôm afraid that the servers are getting dead, but I hope not. The most of the players are rage-quitting when they are losing the whole time, that is the reason cuz everyone is selecting only the RPG, the grenade launcher and the one shot sniper!
I shall type now the whole loadout:
1: MP5
2: Desert Eagle
3: Grenades
4: Shotgun
5: Grenade Launcher
6: Balastic Knife
7: RPG
8: One shot sniper
9: Light Machinegun

There is also a Team Deathmatch, and an offline mode with bots. There are 3 maps, but I think everyone is playing only the arena map, where also are teleport points to go to other places in the map, the respawning is very quick and the ragdoll of bodies is very funny. Now I gonna tell how I play this: I spawn in get a RPG and shoot everyone, when they are close, I shoot them whit my grenade launcher and when they try to shotgun me or one shot me, I just select the MP5 and shoot them, or if you want just teleport yourself to the highest place, and then enjoy one shooting people. The bots are a little bit harder to play with, but if you play a few times and you are good at the game, you can defeat them, the graphics are very old, that is a point, the sound is sometimes annoying, but that‚Äôs not a big deal to me, so I have not encountered very much of bad points about this game‚Ä¶

Conclusion:It was a very nice experience to play this game, my expectations about this game were normal, but it was very nice, so this game impressed me. It is very easy to learn how to play this. I told in the begin about the app, but I haven‚Äôt tested the app yet, so I can‚Äôt say something about that, now I am on the point to give this game a rating: I‚Äôll give it a rating of 8,5 of 10, that is a high rating because this game was really nice to play and I always enjoyed playing it and I‚Äôm still playing it. Well, this was my review about this great game! I hope you enjoyed reading this!

reviewText:
Masked shooters 2? more like Masked epic game 2 *high five*

Masked shooters is a fantastic game that can only be compared to such legendary shooters like Battlefield 4, Call of duty (any of them) and Killzone, the graphics at first sight may be mistaken as being 'low / bad' but in actuall fact after a few hours of research the human eye can only see a certain detail of textures, this game is possibly the only in existence to exceed what the human eye can not display to the brain.

PROS:
- I can get from rank 100 to 10 if i were to get 300 kills
- The first ever game i got all the achievements 100%
- multiple weapon choice
- Realistic physics
- Possibly a next addition to the half life sega?
- the names of the two maps are creative

CONS:
- The number 1 player is worse then me (at number 4)
- the knife needs to be better.

In conclusion not every game can be perfect, but this game does do its best to come close to that title.


PS. no you cannot get all the achievements in 12 minutes (like some wacky comedian mentioned below) because you would need to get 300 kills in 7 minutes without dying and only using a deagle.

I wasn't paid to write this review.
voteText: 13 of 35 people (37%) found this review helpful 10 people found this review funny

reviewText:
On dark cold winter night I installed this - after work without further thinking.
Suprisingly there were people online playing.
Even more suprisingly - that game looks like a generic quake3 engine shooter. It is broken and glitchy. Its weapons are imbalanced. It doesn't even have a score screen at the end of a round. It doesn't even give a ‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô• in offering more than team deathmatch and deathmatch. Or more than 2 maps. There isn't even fall damge. There isn't even accuracy reduction when running while shooting.
But i brought out all my flexibility and adepted on this.  Beeing trapped by fences or flying through the map for no reason is included in the experience.

2 hours later the server was played empty - all achievements were unlocked and I was looking at the steam discussion board and thinking - what did i just witness?

It was a different kind of gaming evening. But it was entertaining.

reviewText:
This game had so much potential, but FreezeNova was too late.

Masked Shooters 2 had so much potential to be a fun game for everyone. FreezeNova took 2 weeks after launch to make a content update. 2 weeks too late, in fact. This game already had mixed reviews. FreezeNova needs to overhaul to make this game better like:
-Weapon Balance
-Different team character models
-MOAR Maps

I'm still giving this game a positive review, but FreezeNova needs to overhaul to make this game better.
